short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add and manage sticky notes on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Note: Your Personal Sticky Notes on the Web

Tired of juggling between note-taking apps and browser tabs? Web Note brings the convenience of sticky notes directly to your web pages. Annotate, remind, and organize your thoughts seamlessly as you browse.

‚≠ê Key Features:

Page-Specific Sticky Notes:

Create notes that are saved exclusively on the web page where you add them. Return to the page, and your notes will be right where you left them.

Easy Note Creation:

Simply click the "+" button to add a new note to the current page. It's quick and intuitive.

Rich Text Formatting:

Customize your notes with bold, italic, and underline text styles.
Insert images directly into your notes to capture more detailed information.

Drag, Drop, and Resize:

Move your notes anywhere on the page. Adjust the size to fit your content perfectly.
Persistent Storage:

Your notes are saved locally in your browser, ensuring they persist across sessions without the need for an account or internet connection.

User-Friendly Interface:

A minimalistic design that is easy on the eyes and simple to navigate.
üîß How to Use Web Note:

Install the Extension:

Click on "Add to Chrome" to install Web Note.
Activate Web Note:

On any web page, click the Web Note icon in the Chrome toolbar to enable the extension.
Create a New Note:

Click the "+" button in the note header to add a new sticky note to the page.
Edit and Format:

Click inside the note to start typing.
Use the formatting toolbar to apply text styles or insert images.
Organize Your Notes:

Drag the note header to reposition it anywhere on the page.
Resize the note by dragging its edges or corners.
Manage Notes:

Minimize notes to keep your view uncluttered.
Delete notes when they're no longer needed by clicking the trash icon.

üîí Privacy and Security:

Local Data Storage:

All your notes are stored locally in your browser's storage. No data is transmitted to external servers.

No Permissions Required:

Web Note doesn't require unnecessary permissions, respecting your privacy.

üí° Use Cases:

Research and Study:

Annotate articles, journals, or study materials directly on the page.
Project Management:

Keep track of tasks and ideas while navigating through project-related websites.
Shopping and Comparison:

Jot down product notes or compare features on e-commerce sites.
Creative Inspiration:

Capture ideas or inspiration as you browse creative content.
üôå Get the Most Out of Web Note:

No Account Needed:

Start using Web Note immediately after installation‚Äîno sign-up required.
Lightweight and Efficient:

Designed to be minimalistic without compromising functionality.
Regular Updates:

We are committed to improving Web Note. Stay tuned for new features and enhancements.
üìß Support and Feedback:

We value your feedback! If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance, please contact us at blinkyofthe2@gmail.com.
üëâ Install Web Note today and revolutionize the way you take notes on the web!
